links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..70
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + 5^(n-2) a(n-2).Associated constant: C_5=lim n-->infty a(n)*a(n-2)/a(n-1)^2 = 1.064478080430862119874641125.... - _Benoit Cloitre_, Aug 30 2003
mathematica: RecurrenceTable[{a[0]==0, a[1]==1, a[n]==a[n-1]+a[n-2]*5^(n-2)},  a, {n, 20}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 09 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [0] cat[n le 2 select 1 else Self(n-1) + Self(n-2)*(5^(n-2)): n in [1..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 09 2012
